subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Marcus Morris and Thomas Robinson had double-doubles and No. 2 Kansas wrapped up its seventh straight Big 12 championship by holding on for a 70-66 win at No. 22 Missouri on Saturday.
snippet: Marcus Morris and Thomas Robinson had double-doubles and No. 2 Kansas wrapped up its seventh straight Big 12 championship by holding on for a 70-66 win at No. 22 Missouri on Saturday.
